title: Moved to a new country, residing there illegally till we get permit, is this haram? Assim al hakeem
transcript: she says that they've moved from america to turkey and they don't have a permanent residency yet so they're sort of illegally residing there though they own a property they're working on their permit so is it haram for them to stay there no this is not haram it's against the law maybe they'll pay a fine but it's not a sin especially with the circumstances that they're living in and that they have a property there muhammad
